Wiener Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for Wiener:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Standard Functions of Wiener processes.

This class implements a Wiener processes. The process can have a time-proportional mean and variance .

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Wiener::next (  )  [virtual]

Calculate next value.

This method should be overridden to implement the calculation of the next value, using information wich is available at the current time.

Reimplemented from Stochastic.

virtual double Wiener::dDelta (  )  [virtual]

Returns the increment.

This is the difference to the next time step. The difference to operator()() is that it never proceeds the object's time.

Reimplemented from Stochastic.
